headline: DexCom (DXCM) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of medical device company DexCom (NASDAQ:DXCM) fell 2.6% in the morning session after analysts at Piper Sandler and Bernstein lowered their price targets on the stock, citing concerns over the company's growth prospects and valuation.
